name: BeeBoy
description:
BEE BOY

Bee Boy is a short and fun platformer game about a bee that fell down when trying to bring back honey to it's hive. Determined to finish it's quest, it now needs to continue on foot and try to avert all oncoming dangers

_____________________________________________

This game features:

  • 3 hand-made levels
  • A challenging boss fight
  • A lot of wonderful art and music

Additional Information:

Controller SupportYesLanguagesGerman, EnglishSupported PlatformsWindows

Credits:

@paninjin Music and some SFX@e_Pics_Sprites and animations@greenpixels_Coding and some art

Important:

Virus detection occasionally picks up game-maker games as false positives. This software is not harmful to your system in any way. 

[Source]
